an2.77-86:77.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a foundation, not without a foundation.
an2.77-86:77.1.2: By giving up that foundation, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:78.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a source, not without a source.
an2.77-86:78.1.2: By giving up that source, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:79.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a cause, not without a cause.
an2.77-86:79.1.2: By giving up that cause, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:80.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with conditions, not without conditions.
an2.77-86:80.1.2: By giving up those conditions, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:81.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a reason, not without a reason.
an2.77-86:81.1.2: By giving up that reason, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:82.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with form, not without form.
an2.77-86:82.1.2: By giving up that form, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:83.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with feeling, not without feeling.
an2.77-86:83.1.2: By giving up that feeling, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:84.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with perception, not without perception.
an2.77-86:84.1.2: By giving up that perception, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:85.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with consciousness, not without consciousness.
an2.77-86:85.1.2: By giving up that consciousness, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
an2.77-86:86.1.1: “Bad, unskillful qualities, mendicants, arise with a conditioned basis, not without a conditioned basis.
an2.77-86:86.1.2: By giving up that conditioned basis, those bad, unskillful qualities do not occur.”
